title: Senior Consultant, Technology Risk
about_the_role: As a Senior Consultant in Technology Risk, you will help clients manage technology-related risks and ensure compliance with industry standards.
key_responsibilities: Conduct assessments of technology controls and processes. Develop risk management frameworks and strategies. Collaborate with clients to implement technology risk solutions. Prepare reports and presentations for stakeholders. Stay current with technology trends and regulatory changes.
requirements: 4-6 years of experience in technology risk or related fields. Strong understanding of IT controls and compliance frameworks. Excellent analytical and communication skills. Relevant certifications (e.g., CISA, CISSP) preferred. Fluency in English and Portuguese required.
